name: Trial of the Princesses
text: Equip only to "White Magician Pikeru" or "Ebon Magician Curran"; it gains 800 ATK. During a turn that the equipped monster destroyed a Level 5 or higher monster by battle, you can Tribute the equipped monster and this card to Special Summon from your hand or Deck: 1 "Princess Pikeru" if you Tributed "White Magician Pikeru", or 1 "Princess Curran" if you Tributed "Ebon Magician Curran".
